* * *  3rd Edition solutions ISM   * * *

Instructor's Solutions Manual (ISM) for "Engineering Vibration, 3rd Edition" by Daniel J. Inman (c2008). Problem statements and solutions included so an easy 3rd-to-4th problem interchange.
